title: Github
text: Github is where I store all my software repositories. This also includes the code for this website! Click the title to see my projects!

title: Article Writing
text: I write articles about various things I learn on Medium to see how effectively I've learnt a specific topic. This helps consolidate my learning, as well as allows other people who read my articles to learn from them as well.

title: Volunteering
text: I volunteer for various teaching positions to teach students about tougher concepts they might not be able to grasp which develops my communication skills
